item.title: Getting Started with Hugo: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: Hugo is a fast, flexible, and open-source static site generator that allows you to build websites with ease. Originally popular for blogging, Hugo’s versatility makes it ideal for creating a wide range of sites — from personal portfolios and academic project showcases to documentation hubs and even e-commerce sites.
